languages.text: {n}Голос Идиры звучит звонко и четко, почти сценически.{/n} "Древний мир с разбитым сердцем. Найдешь к нему тропу — и его богатства твои! Но тропы две, и обе покроют тебя позором, и обе — не то, чем пытаются казаться... Что выберешь, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}? Грех {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Эмпиреев{/g} или грех мертвых богов?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Идиры звучит звонко и четко, почти сценически.{/n} "Древний мир с разбитым сердцем. Найдешь к нему тропу — и его богатства твои! Но тропы две, и обе покроют тебя позором, и обе — не то, чем пытаются казаться... Что выберешь, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}? Грех {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Эмпирей{/g} или грех мертвых богов?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira's voice is sonorous and crystal-clear, almost theatrical.{/n} "An ancient world with a riven heart. Find the path to it — and its riches will be yours! But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? The fall of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrean{/g} or the fall of the dead gods?"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Идиры звучит звонко и четко, почти сценически.{/n} "Древний мир с разбитым сердцем. Найдешь к нему тропу — и его богатства твои! Но тропы две, и обе покроют тебя позором, и обе — не то, чем пытаются казаться... Что выберешь, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}? Грех {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Эмпиреев{/g} или грех мертвых богов?"

But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? The fall of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrean{/g} or the fall of the dead gods?"

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉的声音铿锵有力，晶莹剔透，几乎带着戏剧性。{/n}“某个古老的世界中，有一颗裂开的心。找到通往它的道路，它的财富就属于你！但那里有两条道路，每条都会让你名誉扫地，而且每条道路都与看起来截然不同……你将如何选择，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}？是选择{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}至高天{/g}的罪恶，还是选择殒命诸神的罪恶？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's voice is sonorous and crystal-clear, almost theatrical.{/n} "An ancient world with a riven heart. Find the path to it — and its riches will be yours! But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? The fall of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrean{/g} or the fall of the dead gods?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉的声音铿锵有力，晶莹剔透，几乎带着戏剧性。{/n}“某个古老的世界中，有一颗裂开的心。找到通往它的道路，它的财富就属于你！但那里有两条道路，每条都会让你名誉扫地，而且每条道路都并不是表面的样子……你将如何选择，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}？是选择{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}至高天{/g}的罪恶，还是选择殒命诸神的罪恶？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira's voice is sonorous and crystal-clear, almost theatrical.{/n} "An ancient world with a riven heart. Find the path to it — and its riches will be yours! But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, Rogue Trader? The fall of the Empyrean or the fall of the dead gods?"

languages.text: {n}La voz de Idira es sonora y cristalina, casi teatral.{/n} «Un mundo antiguo con un corazón desgarrado. Encuentre el camino a él... ¡y sus riquezas serán suyas! Pero hay dos caminos: ambos le cubrirán de desgracias y ninguno es lo que parece... ¿Cuál prefiere, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}? ¿La caída del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empíreo{/g} o la caída de los dioses muertos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's voice is sonorous and crystal-clear, almost theatrical.{/n} "An ancient world with a riven heart. Find the path to it — and its riches will be yours! But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? The fall of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrean{/g} or the fall of the dead gods?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Idira es sonora y cristalina, casi teatral.{/n} «Un mundo antiguo con un corazón desgarrado. Encuentre el camino a él... ¡y sus riquezas serán suyas! Pero hay dos caminos: ambos le cubrirán de desgracias y ninguno es lo que parece... ¿Cuál prefiere, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}? ¿El pecado del {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empíreo{/g} o el pecado de los dioses muertos?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラの声は堂々と透き通っており、まるで芝居がかっているかのようだった。{/n}「引き裂かれた心を持つ古代の世界。そこに至る道を見出せば、その富はあなたのものとなるだろう！けれど、その道は二つあり、どちらもあなたを恥辱にまみれさせ、どちらも見えるままではない…{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}、あなたは何を選ぶ？{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}エンピリアン{/g}の滅びか、それとも死んだ神々の滅びか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's voice is sonorous and crystal-clear, almost theatrical.{/n} "An ancient world with a riven heart. Find the path to it — and its riches will be yours! But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? The fall of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrean{/g} or the fall of the dead gods?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラの声は堂々と透き通っており、まるで芝居がかっているかのようだった。{/n}「引き裂かれた心を持つ古代の世界。そこに至る道を見出せば、その富はあなたのものとなるだろう！けれど、その道は二つあり、どちらもあなたを恥辱にまみれさせ、どちらも見えるままではない…{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}、あなたは何を選ぶ？{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}エンピリアン{/g}の滅びか、それとも死んだ神々の滅びか？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idiras Stimme ist sonor und kristallklar, fast theatralisch.{/n} "Eine uralte Welt mit einem gespaltenen Herzen. Findet den Weg dorthin – und ihre Reichtümer sind Euer! Doch Wege gibt es zweie, und beide werden Euch in Schmach und Schande hüllen, und keiner ist, was er scheint ... Wie werdet Ihr wählen, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}? Der Fall des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyreums{/g} oder der Fall der toten Götter?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's voice is sonorous and crystal-clear, almost theatrical.{/n} "An ancient world with a riven heart. Find the path to it — and its riches will be yours! But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? The fall of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrean{/g} or the fall of the dead gods?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idiras Stimme ist sonor und kristallklar, fast theatralisch.{/n} "Eine uralte Welt mit einem gespaltenen Herzen. Findet den Weg dorthin — und ihre Reichtümer sind Euer! Doch Wege gibt es zweie, und beide werden Euch in Schmach und Schande hüllen, und keiner ist, was er scheint ... Wie werdet Ihr wählen, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}? Die Sünde des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyreums{/g} oder die Sünde der toten Götter?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Idira prend une sonorité cristalline, presque théâtrale.{/n} « Un monde ancien au cœur fendu. Trouvez le chemin qui y mène et ses richesses vous appartiendront ! Pour ce faire, deux voies s'offrent à vous. Toutes deux mènent à la disgrâce et se présentent sous des apparences trompeuses... Que choisirez-vous, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} ? La chute de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrée{/g} ou celle des dieux éteints ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's voice is sonorous and crystal-clear, almost theatrical.{/n} "An ancient world with a riven heart. Find the path to it — and its riches will be yours! But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? The fall of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrean{/g} or the fall of the dead gods?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Idira prend une sonorité cristalline, presque théâtrale.{/n} « Un monde ancien au cœur fendu. Trouvez le chemin qui y mène et ses richesses vous appartiendront ! Pour ce faire, deux voies s'offrent à vous. Toutes deux mènent à la disgrâce et se présentent sous des apparences trompeuses... Que choisirez-vous, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} ? Le péché de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrée{/g} ou celui des dieux éteints ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, gür ve net bir sesle konuşuyor. Sesinde âdeta dramatik bir tını var.{/n} "Yarık bir kalbi olan kadim bir dünya... Ona açılan yolu bulursan tüm zenginlikleri senin olur! Fakat karşına iki yol çıkacak. Her ikisi de itibarını zedeleyecek ve hiçbiri görüneni vadetmeyecek. Hangi yoldan gideceksin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}? {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Gök Diyar'ın{/g} yıkılışını mı yoksa ölü tanrıların çöküşünü mü seçeceksin?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira's voice is sonorous and crystal-clear, almost theatrical.{/n} "An ancient world with a riven heart. Find the path to it — and its riches will be yours! But paths there are two, and both will cloak you in disgrace, and neither is what it seems... What will you choose, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}? The fall of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Empyrean{/g} or the fall of the dead gods?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, gür ve net bir sesle konuşuyor. Sesinde âdeta dramatik bir tını var.{/n} "Yarık bir kalbi olan kadim bir dünya... Ona açılan yolu bulursan tüm zenginlikleri senin olur! Fakat karşına iki yol çıkacak. Her ikisi de itibarını zedeleyecek ve hiçbiri görüneni vadetmeyecek. Hangi yoldan gideceksin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}? {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Gök Diyar{/g}'ın yıkılışını mı yoksa ölü tanrıların çöküşünü mü seçeceksin?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
